name: mylookapp
description: Mobile-first web app (wrapper-ready for Android) to: - Upload/store clothing, shoes, and accessories - Generate outfit suggestions by look type - Regenerate until accepted - Save accepted looks to history - Use season/weather/time context (with day/night override) - Call OpenAI API for smarter, up-to-date styling suggestions

scripts.build:web: mkdir -p www && cp index.html styles.css app.js www/
scripts.cap:copy: npm run build:web && npx cap copy android
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build:web && npx cap sync android
